i1.name: Mortal Will
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Pantheon''' gains a [[stack]] of ''Mortal Will'' when he lands a [[basic attack]] {{tip|on-hit}} or casts an [[ability]], up to a maximum of 5. At 5 stacks, '''Pantheon's''' next basic ability consume the stacks to grant bonus effects.
'''Pantheon''' gains full stacks upon starting the game, upon completing a {{si|Recall}} channel, and upon [[death|respawning]].
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Pantheon gains a stack of Mortal Will when he lands a basic attack on-hit or casts an ability, up to a maximum of 5. At 5 stacks, Pantheon's next basic ability consume the stacks to grant bonus effects.
Pantheon gains full stacks upon starting the game, upon completing a Recall channel, and upon death.

q1.name: Comet Spear
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Pantheon''' {{tip|channel|charges}} for up to 4 seconds, increasing ''Comet Spear's'' range while being {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 10%. ''Comet Spear'' can be recast at any time within its duration.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Pantheon''' hurls his spear in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies hit, {{ccs|increased|physical}} against enemies below {{as|20% of their '''maximum''' health}} but reduced by 50% against enemies beyond the first. Total damage is reduced by 30% against {{tip|minions}}.

Releasing the ability within {{fd|0.35}} seconds causes '''Pantheon''' to instead thrust his spear in the target direction, dealing the same {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies hit and refunding 60% of ''Comet Spear's'' {{sti|cooldown}}. The thrust's damage is not reduced against enemies beyond the first.

If '''Pantheon''' is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} during the charge, or the charge completes without reactivation, ''Comet Spear'' is cancelled and the ability is put on full cooldown but refunds {{sti|mana|{{as|half the mana cost}}}}.

{{sbc|{{ai|Mortal Will|Pantheon}}:}} Deals an additional {{as|{{pp|20 to 240}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 115% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, affected by the previous damage reductions, to all enemies hit. Consumes the stacks upon recasting.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Pantheon charges for up to 4 seconds, increasing Comet Spear's range while being slowed by 10%. Comet Spear can be recast at any time within its duration.
Recast: Pantheon hurls his spear in the target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit, Unknown value: ccs increased physical against enemies below 20% of their maximum health but reduced by 50% against enemies beyond the first. Total damage is reduced by 30% against minions.
Releasing the ability within 0.35 seconds causes Pantheon to instead thrust his spear in the target direction, dealing the same physical damage to all enemies hit and refunding 60% of Comet Spear's cooldown. The thrust's damage is not reduced against enemies beyond the first.
If Pantheon is interrupted during the charge, or the charge completes without reactivation, Comet Spear is cancelled and the ability is put on full cooldown but refunds half the mana cost.
Mortal Will: Deals an additional 20undefined − 240undefined (based on level) (+ 115% bonus AD) bonus physical damage, affected by the previous damage reductions, to all enemies hit. Consumes the stacks upon recasting.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|70 to 190}} {{as|(+ 115% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Increased Damage|{{ap|155 to 455}} {{as|(+ 230% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Secondary Physical Damage|{{ap|70*0.5 to 190*0.5}} {{as|(+ {{ap|115*0.5}}% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Increased Secondary Damage|{{ap|155*0.5 to 455*0.5}} {{as|(+ {{ap|230*0.5}}% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q1.notes:
* Only the ranged version of ''Comet Spear'' can be {{tip|projectile|intercepted}}.
* ''Comet Spear'' will cast from wherever '''Pantheon''' is at the end of the cast time.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Pantheon''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|charge|items=true,true,interrupts,false,interrupts,interrupts}}

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 115% bonus AD)
  • Increased Damage: (+ 230% bonus AD)
  • Secondary Physical Damage: (+ % bonus AD)
  • Increased Secondary Damage: (+ % bonus AD)

w1.name: Shield Vault
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Pantheon''' {{tip|dash|leaps}} to the front of the target enemy's location, dealing them {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for 1 second upon arrival.

{{sbc|{{ai|Mortal Will|Pantheon}}:}} '''Pantheon's''' next basic attack within 4 seconds becomes {{tip|unstoppable basic attack|unstoppable}} and strikes his target 3 times, dealing {{as|{{pp|135/3 to 165/3|key=%}} AD}} {{as|physical damage}} per hit, up to {{as|{{pp|135 to 165|key=%}} AD}}. Each hit is affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers and applies {{tip|on-hit}} effects at 100% effectivness.
''Empowered Shield Vault'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Pantheon's''' basic attack timer.
''The ability can be dodged if the target moves 800 units away.''
'''''Pantheon''' will attempt to basic attack the target at the end of the leap.''
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Pantheon leaps to the front of the target enemy's location, dealing them physical damage and stunning them for 1 second upon arrival.
Mortal Will: Pantheon's next basic attack within 4 seconds becomes unstoppable and strikes his target 3 times, dealing 135/3% − 165/3% (based on level) AD physical damage per hit, up to 135% − 165% (based on level) AD. Each hit is affected by critical strike modifiers and applies on-hit effects at 100% effectivness.
Empowered Shield Vault resets Pantheon's basic attack timer.
The ability can be dodged if the target moves 800 units away.
Pantheon will attempt to basic attack the target at the end of the leap.
w1.notes:
* The 3 strikes scale with '''Pantheon's''' {{stil|attack speed}}.
* Applies {{tip|spell damage}} on the initial vault. Deals {{tip|default damage}} on the additional attacks from the empowered ability.
* The 3 strikes that occurs after ''Empowered Shield Vault'' each apply a stack of {{ai|Mortal Will|Pantheon}}, even if the attacks are {{tip|dodged}}, {{tip|blocked}}, or missed while '''Pantheon''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.

e1.name: Aegis Assault
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Pantheon''' braces his shield in the target direction, {{tip|channel|channeling}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds as well as becoming {{tip|slow|slowed}} for between {{pp|type=his movement direction|label1=Angle (Pantheon's movement direction)|label2=Slow percentage|0; 0 to 25|key=%|0° (Forward); 60; 90°(Strafe Left/Right); 120; 150; 180° (Backward)|key1={{degree}}|formula=''The slow percentage is measured and updates relative to the shield's facing direction.''}}. ''Aegis Assault'' cannot be {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} by {{tip|crowd control}}. ''Aegis Assault'' can be recast after {{fd|0.3}} seconds.

For the duration, '''Pantheon''' is {{tip|invulnerability|invulnerable}} against non-{{tip|turret}} damage dealt by enemies from the target direction, and deals {{ft|up to {{as|100% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} over the duration|{{as|{{fd|8.{{recurring|3}}}}% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} every {{fd|0.125}} seconds}} in a cone to all enemies struck, reduced by 50% against {{tip|minions}}.
At the end of the duration, '''Pantheon''' slams with his shield, dealing {{as|physical damage}}.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Pantheon''' slams with his shield early.
{{sbc|{{ai|Mortal Will|Pantheon}}:}} '''Pantheon''' gains {{sti|{{as|60% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds after slamming his shield.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Pantheon braces his shield in the target direction, channeling for 1.5 seconds as well as becoming slowed for between 0° (Forward); 60; 90°(Strafe Left/Right); 120; 150; 180° (Backward) ‒ undefined. Aegis Assault cannot be interrupted by crowd control. Aegis Assault can be recast after 0.3 seconds.
For the duration, Pantheon is invulnerable against non-turret damage dealt by enemies from the target direction, and deals in a cone to all enemies struck, reduced by 50% against minions.
At the end of the duration, Pantheon slams with his shield, dealing physical damage.
Recast: Pantheon slams with his shield early.
Mortal Will: Pantheon gains 60% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds after slamming his shield.
e1.notes:
*The initial cast count as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{nie|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
**Detonating the ability manually is not.
* {{tip|Blink}} ability damage is calculated before the displacement.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will only block the slam's damage.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Pantheon''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|channel|attack=false|move=true|cast=false|items=true,,, false|spells=true, true, true, false, false|interrupts=death}}

r1.name: Grand Starfall
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Pantheon''' gains {{sti|{{as|armor penetration}}}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Pantheon''' {{tip|channel|channels}} for 2 seconds, then leaps high into the air, {{tip|vanish|vanishing}} and becoming {{tip|cc-immune|immune to crowd control}} until he reappears. While in the air, '''Pantheon''' {{tip|channel|channels}} again for {{fd|2.45}} seconds and grants {{tip|sight}} around the target location {{fd|0.5}} seconds into the channel.

After {{fd|1.125}} seconds into the channel, '''Pantheon''' prepares for landing by marking his destination with his spear over {{fd|0.1625}} seconds. The spear deals {{as|{{pp|type=[[File:Comet Spear.png|20px|border]] Comet Spear's rank|40 to 190 for 6|0;1;2;3;4;5}} {{as|(+ 115% '''bonus''' AD)}} physical damage|physical damage}} to enemies in an area and {{tip|slows}} them by 50% for 2 seconds.

Over the remaining {{fd|1.1625}} seconds, '''Pantheon''' crashes down and creates a shockwave that travels toward the target location, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies within its path, decreased by up to 50% for those hit at the edge of the area. Upon completion of the channel, '''Pantheon''' {{tip|blink|reappears}} at the target location and gains full stacks of {{ai|Mortal Will|Pantheon}}.
''Grand Starfall'' is put on a 30 second {{sti|cooldown}} if the first channel is canceled.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Pantheon gains armor penetration.
Active: Pantheon channels for 2 seconds, then leaps high into the air, vanishing and becoming immune to crowd control until he reappears. While in the air, Pantheon channels again for 2.45 seconds and grants sight around the target location 0.5 seconds into the channel.
After 1.125 seconds into the channel, Pantheon prepares for landing by marking his destination with his spear over 0.1625 seconds. The spear deals 0;1;2;3;4;5 ‒ undefined (+ 115% bonus AD) physical damage to enemies in an area and slows them by 50% for 2 seconds.
Over the remaining 1.1625 seconds, Pantheon crashes down and creates a shockwave that travels toward the target location, dealing magic damage to all enemies within its path, decreased by up to 50% for those hit at the edge of the area. Upon completion of the channel, Pantheon reappears at the target location and gains full stacks of Mortal Will.
Grand Starfall is put on a 30 second cooldown if the first channel is canceled.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|300 to 700}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}|Minimum Damage|{{ap|300/2 to 700/2}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}}}
r1.notes:
* Spear damage is not empowered by {{ai|Mortal Will|Pantheon}}.
* The spear's damage is not increased against enemies below {{as|20% of their '''maximum''' health}}.
* During the second channel, '''Pantheon's''' {{sti|{{as|health}}}} cannot be reduced below {{as|1|health}}. All excess damage is ignored, with the exception of {{tip|raw damage}}.
** '''Pantheon''' will instantly die upon reappearing if he reaches this threshold.
* Abilities that target '''Pantheon''' will redirect to the last location.
* [[Ping|Pinging]] the ability will inform allies in [[Hotkeys and commands|chat]] which {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy champions are in range of ''Grand Starfall''.
* '''Pantheon''' is considered to be in his original casting position even after leaping, but he will {{tip|blink}} to the target location the moment the second channel completes.
* Using ''Grand Starfall'' will inform allies with a ping.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Pantheon''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}} (first channel):
{{ct|channel|items=false|spells=false|attack=false|move=false|cast=false|consume=false|interrupts=death, ground, root, silence}}
* The second channel has the same interactions except it can only be interrupted by {{tip|death}} and not any form of {{tip|crowd control}} because '''Pantheon''' is {{tip|cc-immune|immune to crowd control}}.
* ''Grand Starfall's'' first channel will also be interrupted if he enters the {{ai|Realm of Death|Mordekaiser}}.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 100% AP)
  • Minimum Damage: (+ 50% AP)
